title: If 6 mangoes cost $3.42, how much does 1 mango cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: Case 1 If the mangoes are priced by quantity, then one mango will cost $3.42/6 = $0.57 Case 2If the mangoes are priced by weight, then that individual mango needs to be weighed and multiplies by the price per pound(or gram). Consider the mangoes are of the same type and similar size, the price can be within 10% of $0.57.
